## TIX.getBidPrice() method

Given a stockâ€™s symbol (NOT the company name), returns the bid price of that stock. The symbol is a sequence of two to four capital letters.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getBidPrice(sym: StockSymbol): number;
```

|  sym | [StockSymbol](./bitburner.stocksymbol.md) | Stock symbol. |
